About The CompanyInnovative platform providing value-based physician care servicesIndustryHospital & Health CareTypePrivately Held, VC-backedFounded2014Employees1001-5000Funding$200+ millionCategoriesHealth CareHospitalityMedicalWellnessBiotechHealthcareProductivity ToolsSpecialtiesAccountable Care Organizations (ACOs)Health Information TechnologyData Analyticsand Physician CollaborationsBusiness ClassificationsB2CAbout The RoleThe Vice President of Health Equity will be responsible for driving the organization's data-informed health equity strategy and overseeing ongoing improvements on key equity metrics to deliver significant growth and operational efficiency.Hiring Manager TitleExecutive Vice PresidentTravel PercentLess than 10%FunctionsMedical Care/Hospital AdministrationKnown RequirementsSubstantial experience in developing and championing comprehensive health equity strategies across complex health provider organizations requiredExceptional data analysis, data visualization, and data communications skills requiredDemonstrated ability to build and maintain relationships with key stakeholders and communities requiredStrong understanding of value-based care principles required
